headline.main: China Cuts Growth Target as It Pushes Through Reforms, Builds 'Firewall' Against Risks
headline.print_headline: China Cuts Growth Target as It Pushes Through Reforms, Builds 'Firewall' Against Risks

lead_paragraph: China has cut its growth target this year as the world's second-largest economy pushes through painful reforms to address a rapid build-up in debt, and constructs a "firewall" against financial risks.
snippet: China has cut its growth target this year as the world's second-largest economy pushes through painful reforms to address a rapid build-up in debt, and constructs a "firewall" against financial risks....
